name: Clash of Cop City Crime Combat
name_original: Clash of Cop City Crime Combat
description:
Clash of Cop City Crime Combat

Do you think you can be driving a police car!! Make sure you don’t break the cop wegon.
Would you like to take part in ruthless gunfights with policemen?
Perform a lot of interesting criminal missions and become the king of the gangland!
Police Car mission games based around tasks to sort out the crime in the city, Your behind the wheel of a police car and your job is to bring order to the city crime, each level will have tasks for you to do like stop thieves and petty offenses along with some car case guiltiness.

Play as the chasing cops and catch law breakers and escapes in this endless police motor run/chase game.
It is Combination of all games like fighting, running, racing, action, adventure, terrorist game, stunt, mission, shooting games. This is a game of theft auto.
Missile is prepared fire or shoot into the air or at an objective. We need to control Missile to achieve its target.
Control your car or bike to climb hills with most realistic control to face the challenges of unique uphill & downhill environments.

A huge number of weapons, awesome cars, girls, shootings, car pursuits, actions in the first part of the famous game Clash of Cop City Crime Combat!
With a massive and diverse open world, a wild cast of characters from every walk of life and the freedom to explore at will, Clash of Cop City Crime Combat puts the dark, intriguing and ruthless world of guiltiness at your fingertips.

Cops & Mafia Gangs guiltiness Game the real Action Game. It is Combat of cop Sniper vs terrorist Multilevel Shooting Game.
Cops face lot's of challenges against criminal,Terrorist,Mafia & Deadly infected Zombies.Snipe them between town traffic.
You Need to speed trigger the rifle. Hunt all tirailleur by headshot. Hunting all hidden city wanted.
One Prisoner killed our two officers and escape from jail / prison. jailer Department give you job to kill him.

This is time to show your skill and help jailer to execute mafia gang members..
Some criminal is trying to put bomb near bus and car, customize your Gun and kill the bomber.
To know more about this game must download this game.... It is free to play and download.

Features:

• Visually stunning updated graphics, character and vehicle models
• HD quality resolution
• Gameplay optimized for touch screen devices
• Additional customization traffic frequency
